OOC: Yeah, I know, but Train Wreck has an anti-electricity system. I gave h=
im that because he carries passengers.

BIC: Train Wreck is knocked over by=
 the tail.

Train Wreck: Alright.

Stronghold and Blender both stepped out =
of Train Wreck and dropped to the ground from his now several feet off of t=
he ground door.

Stronghold: It's too small in there.

They both transform =
into feet. Train Wreck changes into the body. Stranato and Airbomber change=
 into the arms, and they all connect together. Doom ice and Rizopas both tr=
ansform into huge guns and attach to the arms. Radistor was formed once aga=
in.

Radistor: We don't want to screw up time, we're Maximals!

Radistor sw=
ung a huge punch at Gemini Dragon's face. (Radistor is and always has been =
50 feet tall)
